TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChtmlTextWriter extends System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter

summary.span: 將一系列 cHTML 特定字元和文字寫入 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的輸出資料流。

span.span: Writes a series of cHTML-specific characters and text to the output stream of an ASP.NET server control.

summary.span: 類別提供格式化功能，當 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項向用戶端呈現 cHTML 內容時會使用這些格式化功能。

span.span: The class provides formatting capabilities that ASP.NET server controls use when rendering cHTML content to clients.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Compact HTML 或 cHTML 是 HTML 2.0、 HTML 3.2 和 HTML 4.0 的子集，而且設計來呈現具有有限的記憶體與 CPU 能力，以及有限的格式化功能，以及有限的輸入選項 （例如行動電話的小型顯示螢幕的裝置觸控板）。Compact HTML, or cHTML, is a subset of HTML 2.0, HTML 3.2, and HTML 4.0, and is designed to render on devices with limited memory and CPU power, along with small display screens, limited formatting capabilities, and a limited number of input options (such as a cell phone touch pad). 因此，cHTML 不支援下列：Therefore, cHTML does not support the following: - JPEG 影像。JPEG images. - 資料表。Tables. - 影像對應。Image maps. - 多個字元的字型和樣式。Multiple character fonts and styles. - 背景色彩與影像。Background colors and images. - 畫面格。Frames. - 樣式表。Style sheets. 類別衍生自類別和其功能的大部分由提供和基底類別之所有標記的文字寫入器，也就是類別。The class derives from the class and much of its functionality is provided by the and the base class for all markup text writers, which is the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立一個名為類別`CustomChtmlTextWriter`衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create a class named `CustomChtmlTextWriter` that is derived from the class. 它會建立兩個建構函式，並會覆寫方法，即可避免`bgcolor`寫入至輸出資料流的樣式屬性物件。It creates two constructors and overrides the method to prevent the `bgcolor` style attribute from being written to the output stream of the object. 它也會建立一個名為類別`ChtmlCustomPageAdapter`定義一個方法， `CreateCustomChtmlTextWriter`，這會建立並傳回的執行個體`CustomChtmlTextWriter`類別。It also creates a class named `ChtmlCustomPageAdapter` that defines one method, `CreateCustomChtmlTextWriter`, which creates and returns an instance of the `CustomChtmlTextWriter` class. `CustomChtmlTextWriter`然後呈現 cHTML 內容頁面，即可搭配使用的 cHTML 標記的瀏覽器的裝置。The `CustomChtmlTextWriter` then renders cHTML content for a page to devices with browsers that use cHTML markup. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/cs/chtmltextwriter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/vb/chtmltextwriter.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別具有兩個建構函式，這是標準的所有直接或間接衍生自的類別類別。The class has two constructors, which is standard for all classes that derive directly or indirectly from the class. 的執行個體的建構函式類別做為參數，會呼叫第二個建構函式，並將它傳遞兩個參數值：The constructor, which takes an instance of the class as a parameter, calls the second constructor and passes it two parameter values: - 。The . - 中指定的字串值欄位，定義定位間距所使用的 XHTML 文字寫入器。The string value that is specified in the field, which defines the tab spacing that is used by the XHTML text writer. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立一個名為類別`ChtmlCustomPageAdapter`定義一個方法，並`CreateCustomChtmlTextWriter`，這會建立並傳回的執行個體`CustomChtmlTextWriter`類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create a class named `ChtmlCustomPageAdapter` and defines one method, `CreateCustomChtmlTextWriter`, which creates and returns an instance of the `CustomChtmlTextWriter` class. `CustomChtmlTextWriter`然後呈現 cHTML 內容頁來搭配使用的 cHTML 標記的瀏覽器的裝置。The `CustomChtmlTextWriter` then renders cHTML content for pages to devices with browsers that use cHTML markup. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/cs/chtmltextwriter.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/vb/chtmltextwriter.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的這兩個執行個體的建構函式類別和字串做為參數，呼叫建立的執行個體時，使用相同的參數建構函式類別。The constructor, which takes both an instance of the class and a string as parameters, calls the constructor that takes the same parameters when it creates an instance of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立名為的自訂類別`CustomChtmlTextWriter`衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom class named `CustomChtmlTextWriter` that is derived from the class. 它會建立兩個建構函式，可用來建立自訂類別的執行個體使用相同的模式做為所有的類別衍生，直接或間接從類別。It creates two constructors that you can use to create an instance of the custom class with the same pattern as all classes that derive, directly or indirectly, from the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/cs/chtmltextwriter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/vb/chtmltextwriter.vb#1)]

summary.span: 判斷指定的 cHTML 屬性和其值是否在提出要求的網頁上呈現。

span.span: Determines whether the specified cHTML attribute and its value are rendered to the requesting page.

summary.span: 您可以從 類別衍生的類別中覆寫 方法，篩選出不要在支援 cHTML 之裝置上呈現的屬性。

span.span: You can override the method in classes that derive from the class to filter out attributes that you do not want to render on devices that support cHTML.

returns.span: 表示將屬性及其值寫入 輸出資料流，否則為 。

span.span: to write the attribute and its value to the output stream; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，方法會讓全域隱藏的屬性中所列屬性和項目專用、 隱藏的屬性中所列屬性寫入至輸出資料流。By default, the method prevents globally suppressed attributes that are listed in the property and element-specific, suppressed attributes that are listed in the property from being written to the output stream. 您可以覆寫行為衍生自的類別中的方法類別。You can override the behavior of the method in classes that are derived from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用自訂的類別會覆寫方法，即可避免`bgcolor`寫入 cHTML 輸出資料流的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use a custom class that overrides the method to prevent the `bgcolor` attribute from being written to the cHTML output stream. 然後它會呼叫基底所提供的功能方法從類別，以確保使用其預設行為，太。It then calls the functionality that is provided by the base method from the class to ensure that its default behavior is used, too. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/cs/chtmltextwriter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/vb/chtmltextwriter.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks CHTML 項目是否`span`項目，方法會傳回`false`。If the cHTML element is a `span` element, the method returns `false`. 針對所有其他標記，它會傳回`true`。For all other tags, it returns `true`.

summary.span: 將 項目寫入 cHTML 輸出資料流中。

span.span: Writes a element to the cHTML output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用cHMTL 之資料流的方法來插入行中斷。Use the method to insert a line break into a stream of cHMTL. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何建立 cHTML 類別和自訂屬性。The first code example demonstrates how to create a cHTML class and custom properties. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何在網頁上使用的自訂類別。The second code example demonstrates how to use a custom class on a Web page. 若要使用自訂`ChtmlSimplelabelAdapter`配接器，將下列程式碼加入其中一個適當全機器的檔案的子目錄中的.NET Framework 組態目錄或自訂的瀏覽器檔案 App_Browsers 底下目錄中的 Web 瀏覽器應用程式的根目錄。To use the custom `ChtmlSimplelabelAdapter` adapter, add the following code to either the appropriate machine-wide file in the subdirectory for the browser of the .NET Framework configuration directory or to a custom browser file in the App_Browsers directory under the Web application root. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立名為 cHTML 配接器類別`ChtmlSimpleLabelAdapter`類別，名為`SimpleLabel`。The following code example demonstrates how to create a cHTML adapter class named `ChtmlSimpleLabelAdapter` for a class named `SimpleLabel`. 它會建立自訂`Control`屬性，可讓`ChtmlSimpleLabelAdapter`類別來存取的成員`SimpleLabel`類別，然後按一下 覆寫方法。It creates a custom `Control` property that allows the `ChtmlSimpleLabelAdapter` class to access the members of the `SimpleLabel` class, and then overrides the method. 在 覆寫時，會發生下列動作：In the override, the following things occur: - 它會建立參照名為的物件`w`，其係衍生自物件，傳遞做為`writer`參數方法。It creates a reference to a object, named `w`, which is derived from the object that is passed as the `writer` parameter for the method. - 它會建立字串，並將它設定為等於`SimpleLabel.Text`值。It creates a string and sets it equal to the `SimpleLabel.Text` value. - 它會呼叫方法，以套用所定義的樣式屬性寫入 cHTML 標籤的輸出資料流。It calls the method to apply the styles that are defined by the property of the label to the cHTML output stream. - 它會寫入`Text`屬性值的資料流和關閉的樣式區塊，藉由呼叫方法。It writes the `Text` property value to the stream and closes the style block by calling the method. - 它會呼叫方法以呈現`br`之後的文字和樣式轉譯的輸出資料流的項目。It calls the method to render a `br` element to the output stream after the text and styles render. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1/cs/chtmltestlabel.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1/VB/chtmltestlabel.vb#2)] 下列範例示範如何使用`SimpleLabel`在網頁中的類別。The following example demonstrates how to use the `SimpleLabel` class in a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1/cs/chtmltestlabel.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1/VB/chtmltestlabel.aspx#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override void WriteEncodedText (string text);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteEncodedText(string text) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub WriteEncodedText (text As String)
public: override void WriteEncodedText(System::String ^ text);
override this.WriteEncodedText : string -> unit

param.name: text
param.span: 要編碼及寫入輸出資料流的文字字串。

span.span: The text string to encode and write to the output stream.

summary.span: 為要求的裝置編碼指定的文字，然後將其寫入輸出資料流。

span.span: Encodes the specified text for the requesting device, and then writes it to the output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果文字參數傳遞至方法是`null`或長度為零，則不寫入任何字串。If the text parameter passed into the method is `null` or has a length of zero, then nothing is written. 使用方法，當字串包含角括弧 (\<或 >) 或連字號 (&) 和您想要確保它們會正確呈現在提出要求的裝置。Use the method when a string contains angle brackets (\< or >) or an ampersand (&) and you want to ensure that they are rendered correctly on the requesting device. 方法會使用基底類別的方法。The method uses the base class's method.
